    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    "./skills/react-native-basics/SKILL.md",
    "./skills/react-native-navigation/SKILL.md",

}

{
  "schema_version": "1.0",
  "name": "custom-plugin-aspnet-core",
  "title": "Custom Plugin ASP.NET Core",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "Production-grade ASP.NET Core development plugin with 3 agents, 3 skills, and complete learning infrastructure for enterprise applications. Implements 2024-2025 best practices including Clean Architecture, CQRS, GitOps, and comprehensive observability.",
  "author": "Custom Plugin Team",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "aspnet-core",
    "csharp",
    "dotnet",
    "web-development",
    "enterprise",
    "microservices",
    "api-development",
    "clean-architecture",
    "cqrs",
    "docker",
    "kubernetes",
    "azure",
    "devops"
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Backend Specialist",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core backend development, APIs, and enterprise applications with production-grade patterns",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-backend.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "ASP.NET Core Framework",
        "C# Programming",
        "RESTful API Design",
        "Entity Framework Core",
        "Authentication & Authorization",
        "Performance Optimization"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "code_blocks",
          "references"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Infrastructure",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in ASP.NET Core deployment, Docker, Azure, CI/CD, and Kubernetes with GitOps practices",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-devops.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Docker & Containerization",
        "Azure Cloud Services",
        "CI/CD Pipelines",
        "Kubernetes Orchestration",
        "Infrastructure as Code",
        "Monitoring & Observability"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "manifests",
          "commands",
          "warnings"
        ]
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Architecture & Design",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "description": "Expert in system design, patterns, and enterprise architecture with DDD and CQRS",
      "path": "./agents/aspnet-core-architecture.md",
      "capabilities": [
        "Architectural Patterns",
        "SOLID Principles",
        "Design Patterns",
        "Domain-Driven Design",
        "CQRS & Event Sourcing",
        "Microservices Architecture"
      ],
      "io_schema": {
        "input": [
          "query",
          "context"
        ],
        "output": [
          "response",
          "diagrams",
          "trade_offs",
          "recommendations"
        ]
      }
    }
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "learn",
      "description": "Start learning ASP.NET Core with personalized path",
      "path": "./commands/learn.md",
      "usage": "/learn [track]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid track specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "project",
      "description": "Get hands-on project templates and guidance",
      "path": "./commands/project.md",
      "usage": "/project [level]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Invalid level specified"
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "deploy",
      "description": "Deploy ASP.NET Core application to production",
      "path": "./commands/deploy.md",
      "usage": "/deploy [target]",
      "exit_codes": {
        "0": "Success",
        "1": "Deployment failed",
        "2": "Configuration error"
      }
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-fundamentals",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Fundamentals",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-fundamentals/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-backend",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-advanced",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core Advanced Development",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-advanced/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-architecture",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    },
    {
      "id": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "name": "ASP.NET Core DevOps & Production",
      "version": "2.0.0",
      "path": "./skills/aspnet-core-devops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "aspnet-core-devops",
      "features": {
        "parameter_validation": true,
        "retry_logic": true,
        "observability": true,
        "test_templates": true
      }
    }
  ],
  "requirements": {
    "claude_code_version": ">=1.0.0",
    "sasmp_version": "1.3.0"
  },
  "quality_standards": {
    "ethical": "No dark patterns, transparent behavior",
    "honest": "Accurate capability claims",
    "modern": "2024-2025 industry standards",
    "maintainable": "Self-documenting code"
  },
  "changelog": {
    "2.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-12-30",
      "changes": [
        "Added I/O schemas to all agents",
        "Implemented error handling with retry policies",
        "Added comprehensive troubleshooting guides",
        "Implemented parameter validation for all skills",
        "Added observability hooks (logging, metrics, tracing)",
        "Included unit test templates",
        "Updated to ASP.NET Core 8/9 best practices",
        "Added integrity checks"
      ]
    },
    "1.0.0": {
      "date": "2025-01-01",
      "changes": [
        "Initial release with SASMP v1.3.0 compliance"
      ]
    }
  }
}

--- ## ğŸ“‘ Table of Contents

--- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Prerequisites - Claude Code CLI v2.0.27+ - Active Claude subscription - Node.js 18+ (for Vue development) ### Installation (Choose One)
Option 1: From Marketplace (Recommended) ```bash # Step 1ï¸âƒ£ Add the marketplace /plugin marketplace add pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-vue # Step 2ï¸âƒ£ Install the plugin /plugin install vue-development-assistant@pluginagentmarketplace-vue # Step 3ï¸âƒ£ Restart Claude Code # Close and reopen your terminal/IDE ```
Option 2: Local Installation ```bash # Clone the repository git clone https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-vue.git cd custom-plugin-vue # Load locally /plugin load . # Restart Claude Code ```
### âœ… Verify Installation After restart, you should see these agents: ``` vue-development-assistant:01-vue-fundamentals vue-development-assistant:02-vue-composition vue-development-assistant:03-vue-pinia vue-development-assistant:04-vue-router vue-development-assistant:05-vue-nuxt vue-development-assistant:06-vue-testing vue-development-assistant:07-vue-typescript ``` --- ## âœ¨ Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | ğŸ–¼ï¸ **Vue 3.5 Fundamentals** | Components, directives, reactivity basics | | ğŸ”„ **Composition API** | `setup()`, composables, `ref`/`reactive` | | ğŸ **Pinia State** | Modern state management with stores | | ğŸ›£ï¸ **Vue Router** | Navigation, guards, dynamic routes | | âš¡ **Nuxt 3** | SSR, file-based routing, modules | | ğŸ§ª **Testing** | Vitest, Vue Test Utils, component testing | | ğŸ“˜ **TypeScript** | Type-safe Vue with `defineComponent` | --- ## ğŸ¤– Agents ### 7 Specialized Vue Agents | # | Agent | Purpose | Bonded Skill | |---|-------|---------|--------------| | 1 | **01-vue-fundamentals** | Vue 3.5 core concepts: SFC, directives, lifecycle hooks, reactivity basics | `vue-fundamentals` | | 2 | **02-vue-composition** | Composition API mastery: `setup()`, `ref`, `reactive`, composables, provide/inject | `vue-composition-api` | | 3 | **03-vue-pinia** | Pinia state management: stores, getters, actions, plugins, SSR hydration | `vue-pinia` | | 4 | **04-vue-router** | Vue Router 4: navigation guards, dynamic routing, lazy loading, scroll behavior | `vue-router` | | 5 | **05-vue-nuxt** | Nuxt 3 framework: SSR/SSG, file-based routing, modules, deployment | `vue-nuxt` | | 6 | **06-vue-testing** | Testing with Vitest & Vue Test Utils: unit, component, integration tests | `vue-testing` | | 7 | **07-vue-typescript** | TypeScript in Vue: type inference, generics, `defineComponent`, strict typing | `vue-typescript` | ### Usage Example ```bash # Ask a Vue fundamentals question @vue-development-assistant:01-vue-fundamentals How do I create a reusable component? # Get Composition API help @vue-development-assistant:02-vue-composition Create a composable for form validation # Pinia state management @vue-development-assistant:03-vue-pinia Set up a user authentication store # Vue Router navigation @vue-development-assistant:04-vue-router Implement route guards for protected pages # Nuxt 3 SSR @vue-development-assistant:05-vue-nuxt Configure Nuxt for SEO optimization # Testing @vue-development-assistant:06-vue-testing Write tests for a login component # TypeScript @vue-development-assistant:07-vue-typescript Type a complex Pinia store ``` --- ## ğŸ› ï¸ Skills ### Available Skills (Golden Format âœ¨) All skills follow the **Golden Format** with real content: - `assets/` - config.yaml, schema.json - `scripts/` - validate.py - `references/` - GUIDE.md, PATTERNS.md | Skill | Description | Invoke | |-------|-------------|--------| | `vue-fundamentals` | Core Vue 3.5 concepts, SFC syntax, reactivity, lifecycle | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-fundamentals")` | | `vue-composition-api` | Composition API patterns, composables, `ref`/`reactive` | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-composition-api")` | | `vue-pinia` | Pinia stores, state management, plugins, devtools | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-pinia")` | | `vue-router` | Routing, navigation guards, meta fields, transitions | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-router")` | | `vue-nuxt` | Nuxt 3 SSR/SSG, auto-imports, modules, deployment | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-nuxt")` | | `vue-testing` | Vitest, Vue Test Utils, mocking, snapshot tests | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-testing")` | | `vue-typescript` | TypeScript integration, type inference, generic components | `Skill("vue-development-assistant:vue-typescript")` | --- ## âŒ¨ï¸ Commands | Command | Description | |---------|-------------| | `/explore-roadmap` | Explore Vue.js learning roadmap interactively | | `/learning-path` | Get personalized Vue learning path based on your level | | `/skill-assessment` | Assess your Vue.js skills and identify gaps | | `/career-guidance` | Vue.js career development and guidance | --- ## ğŸ“š Learning Path ### Recommended Progression ``` ğŸŸ¢ Beginner â””â”€â”€ 01-vue-fundamentals â†’ Components, Directives, Reactivity Basics â”‚ â–¼ ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate â”œâ”€â”€ 02-vue-composition â†’ Composition API, Composables â”œâ”€â”€ 03-vue-pinia â†’ State Management â””â”€â”€ 04-vue-router â†’ Navigation & Routing â”‚ â–¼ ğŸ”´ Advanced â”œâ”€â”€ 05-vue-nuxt â†’ SSR/SSG with Nuxt 3 â”œâ”€â”€ 06-vue-testing â†’ Comprehensive Testing â””â”€â”€ 07-vue-typescript â†’ Type-Safe Vue Development ``` ### Estimated Learning Time | Module | Hours | Difficulty | |--------|-------|------------| | Vue Fundamentals | 8h | ğŸŸ¢ Beginner | | Composition API | 6h | ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate | | Pinia | 4h | ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate | | Vue Router | 4h | ğŸŸ¡ Intermediate | | Nuxt 3 | 10h | ğŸ”´ Advanced | | Testing | 8h | ğŸ”´ Advanced | | TypeScript | 10h | ğŸ”´ Advanced | | **Total** | **50h** | - | --- ## files..claude-plugin/plugin.json:
{
  "name": "kubernetes-assistant",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "type": "plugin",
  "description": "Production-grade Kubernetes cluster management, orchestration, and container platform expertise. Master container deployments, cluster administration, networking, security, service mesh, GitOps, and enterprise-grade Kubernetes operations.",
  "eqhm_enabled": true,
  "author": {
    "name": "Plugin Agent Marketplace",
    "email": "pluginagentmarketplace@gmail.com",
    "url": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "repository": "https://github.com/pluginagentmarketplace/custom-plugin-kubernetes",
  "license": "SEE LICENSE IN LICENSE",
  "keywords": [
    "kubernetes",
    "container-orchestration",
    "docker",
    "devops",
    "cluster-management",
    "containerization",
    "cloud-native",
    "production",
    "service-mesh",
    "istio",
    "gitops",
    "argocd",
    "helm",
    "observability",
    "security",
    "multi-cluster"
  ],
  "commands": [
    {
      "name": "quickstart",
      "description": "Get started with Kubernetes - learn basics and best practices"
    },
    {
      "name": "cluster-setup",
      "description": "Guide for setting up production Kubernetes clusters"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshoot",
      "description": "Diagnose and resolve Kubernetes issues"
    },
    {
      "name": "best-practices",
      "description": "Learn Kubernetes best practices and patterns"
    }
  ],
  "agents": [
    {
      "name": "Cluster Administration & Architecture",
      "file": "./agents/01-cluster-admin.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes cluster setup, management, architecture, and operational excellence",
      "capabilities": [
        "cluster-management",
        "etcd",
        "upgrades",
        "disaster-recovery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Container Runtime & Docker",
      "file": "./agents/02-container-runtime.md",
      "description": "Specialist in Docker, container runtimes, image management, and container technologies",
      "capabilities": [
        "docker",
        "containerd",
        "image-building",
        "registry-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Deployment & Orchestration",
      "file": "./agents/03-deployment-orchestration.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes deployments, StatefulSets, DaemonSets, and workload orchestration",
      "capabilities": [
        "deployments",
        "statefulsets",
        "rollout-strategies",
        "hpa",
        "vpa"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Storage & Networking",
      "file": "./agents/04-storage-networking.md",
      "description": "Specialist in persistent storage, networking, service mesh, and cluster communication",
      "capabilities": [
        "csi",
        "pvc",
        "cni",
        "network-policies",
        "gateway-api"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Security & RBAC",
      "file": "./agents/05-security-rbac.md",
      "description": "Expert in Kubernetes security, RBAC, network policies, and compliance",
      "capabilities": [
        "rbac",
        "pss",
        "opa",
        "kyverno",
        "secrets-management"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Monitoring & Observability",
      "file": "./agents/06-monitoring-observability.md",
      "description": "Specialist in observability, monitoring, logging, metrics, and distributed tracing",
      "capabilities": [
        "prometheus",
        "grafana",
        "loki",
        "opentelemetry",
        "slo-alerting"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Development & GitOps",
      "file": "./agents/07-development-gitops.md",
      "description": "Expert in development workflows, CI/CD integration, Helm, and GitOps practices",
      "capabilities": [
        "argocd",
        "helm",
        "kustomize",
        "github-actions",
        "progressive-delivery"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Service Mesh Expert",
      "file": "./agents/08-service-mesh-expert.md",
      "description": "Specialist in service mesh implementation with Istio, Linkerd, traffic management, and zero-trust networking",
      "capabilities": [
        "istio",
        "linkerd",
        "mtls",
        "traffic-management",
        "circuit-breaking"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "skills": [
    {
      "name": "cluster-admin",
      "file": "./skills/cluster-admin/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster lifecycle management, HA, etcd backup, upgrades"
    },
    {
      "name": "docker-containers",
      "file": "./skills/docker-containers/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Container image building, optimization, security scanning"
    },
    {
      "name": "deployments",
      "file": "./skills/deployments/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "03-deployment-orchestration",
      "description": "Deployment strategies, HPA, PDB, Argo Rollouts"
    },
    {
      "name": "storage-networking",
      "file": "./skills/storage-networking/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "04-storage-networking",
      "description": "CSI drivers, Gateway API, NetworkPolicy, CNI"
    },
    {
      "name": "security",
      "file": "./skills/security/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "05-security-rbac",
      "description": "RBAC, PSS, Kyverno, External Secrets Operator"
    },
    {
      "name": "monitoring",
      "file": "./skills/monitoring/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "06-monitoring-observability",
      "description": "Prometheus, Loki, OpenTelemetry, SLO-based alerting"
    },
    {
      "name": "gitops",
      "file": "./skills/gitops/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "ArgoCD, Kustomize, GitHub Actions CI/CD"
    },
    {
      "name": "helm",
      "file": "./skills/helm/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "07-development-gitops",
      "description": "Helm chart development, values schema, release management"
    },
    {
      "name": "troubleshooting",
      "file": "./skills/troubleshooting/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Pod debugging, log analysis, network diagnosis"
    },
    {
      "name": "multi-cluster",
      "file": "./skills/multi-cluster/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "Cluster federation, Cilium Mesh, Velero DR"
    },
    {
      "name": "cost-optimization",
      "file": "./skills/cost-optimization/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "01-cluster-admin",
      "description": "VPA, KEDA, Kubecost, resource right-sizing"
    },
    {
      "name": "service-mesh",
      "file": "./skills/service-mesh/SKILL.md",
      "bonded_agent": "08-service-mesh-expert",
      "description": "Istio, Linkerd, mTLS, traffic management"
    }
  ],
  "hooks": [
    {
      "event": "onPluginLoaded",
      "script": "scripts/init-plugin.sh"
    }
  ],
  "minimumClaudeVersion": "3.7.0",
  "capabilities": {
    "multiAgent": true,
    "parallelExecution": true,
    "skillBased": true,
    "agentBonding": true
  }
}
